attributes.action: have a white line in the centre and at each edge of ALL minor roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have noticed since I started driving that the majority of minor roads (country roads and back lanes) do not have the central or edge lining that more major roads do. I find that it is often very hard to distinguish where the road ends and the verge starts when driving at night, especially if a car is coming the other way with its lights shining in your eyes. I feel that, as there is so much money being invested in road markings, symbols and cameras on the more major roads, that back roads are forgotten about, but these should still be invested in, as more people are making use of local roads since the advent of sat-nav units.
